events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen is cracked and shows several scratches. It doesn’t work properly.
The system identified the issue as a potential product defect based on the customer's report mentioning a cracked screen and scratches.
The support request has been assigned to agent Sarah J., who specializes in defective product cases.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your laptop screen. I’d like to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the cracked screen and any packaging damage? This will help us assess the situation faster.
Here are several pictures showing the cracked screen clearly, along with the package it came in. The box was intact but the screen has visible damage.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer to replace the laptop under warranty or issue a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know your choice.
I would like to receive a replacement laptop, please. I really need it for work and hope the new one arrives quickly.
We have processed your replacement order. You will receive shipping confirmation within 24 hours and the new laptop should arrive within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement laptop and that it’s working correctly. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and everything is perfect. Thank you for your prompt support!
We are glad your issue was resolved satisfactorily. We will now close this support case. Have a great day!
